website_summaries.verdict: The Adizero Afterburner 5 is another model that enriches the baseball cleat arsenal of the Adidas brand. The pair boasts a Sprintskin upper, a Sprintframe outsole, and an Ironskin toe cap that adds to the shoe’s durability. Comfortable and light, this baseball shoe has been deemed by users to be a definite bang for the buck.
pros: A major chunk of the reviewers say that the Adidas Adizero Afterburner 5 is extremely comfortable
A significant number of users like the lightweight feel of this Adidas baseball cleat, which they compare to the Adidas Speed Trainer 3
This iteration of the Adizero Afterburner model is stylish, a handful of shoppers state
Given that one gets the right size, the shoe has a great fit according to a couple of users
The pair is a definite bang for the buck, several users say
Some players say that these really are baseball cleats of high quality
A couple of patrons indicate that the shoe has a clean look
One of the customers says that the pair is easy to put on
cons: Some customers indicate that they have experienced some durability issues when using the fifth version of the Adizero Afterburner

website_summaries.verdict: The Adizero Afterburner V shoe brings a comfortable and stylish look to the diamond. Aside from providing a nice fit, the material also ensures a lightweight feel for its wearers. With its reasonable price, there’s very little reason not to include this cleat in your top picks.
pros: The majority of reviewers say that the Adizero Afterburner V soccer cleat has a great fit
A significant chunk of the reviews for this Adidas baseball cleat indicate that the pair has a lightweight feel
Several customers disclose that this baseball cleat has a comfortable fit
The pair has a great fit, a handful of customers say
This Afterburner cleat brings good value for money, concluded a pair of buyers
Some reviewers discovered that the shoe has a supportive fit
cons: Not too many customers leave reviews of this shoe
There might still be changes when more reviews start rolling in

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shoe for College Kid
customer_reviews.text: College kid has played in only these shoes for several years. Watch for the sale, but he loves the light and quick shoe. Lasts maybe 1.5 season, playing 35 to 45 games per season in all weather.
customer_reviews.author: George the Bookman

customer_reviews.title: SO TIGHT!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The length of the shoe is fine... and even the width is fine - once you're able to get your foot inside the shoe! These shoe companies keep trying to make these snug fitting shoes that become so difficult to get on, one can hardly wear them! I wore these once.... it was literally like a cartoon sequence of event trying to get my foot inside the shoe... different angles, shoe horns, hammer to soften the leather, etc. I knew after the first time - it wasn't worth the effort trying to get these shoe on again, so I had a teammate take them off me at the feild and left them on the bench!
customer_reviews.author: Magnum

customer_reviews.title: Durable and great value
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were part of my son's high school baseball uniform. The school provided us with a "discounted" option to purchase them or we could purchase them on our own. This was a better value. I ordered these in white and blue and my son wore them for the school ball season and now summer ball. They're holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Good cleats
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son for highscool baseball .... working good.... now i just have to get him to take them off before he comes in the house...metal cleats are rough on the floors
customer_reviews.author: Todd Butler

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: It's not so much the shoe itself runs small but the foot opening is small so it's incredibly tight to get the foot in the shoe. I can tell someone else had the same problem because ours came dirty on one side. We thought it was used but noticed the soles were clean. It was just dirty on the top where the foot needs to squeeze into the shoe. It was as if someone with dirty feet or socks tried on one side and returned it when it didn't fit or realized it's too much work to wear the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gons

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great mold to the foot and feels like a sock towards the ankle. It does run a little small, so purchase a half size bigger. Colors are rich and sole seems to be firm and with great traction. Son is optimistic about how they will handle in the field (hs ball)... have not used them in the field, yet.
customer_reviews.author: YV

customer_reviews.title: They ran a Little Big and Bend / Krinkle in an uncomfortable way! Won't wear them again Goodbye$40
customer_reviews.text: These run big for Adidas. I'm old and have worn Adidas for 25 years so I am familiar with their sizing. They are not comfortable shoes. They have a design flaw which causes them to bend and pinch in a very uncomfortable way. I wore them to one practice and that will be the last of it. Say Goodbye to $40.
customer_reviews.author: James Mugno

customer_reviews.title: Likes but revived like new, worn
customer_reviews.text: My son likes them very much. Just wondering why they had dirt in “new” cleats. I shop a lot on amazon for a reason, new means new, this is not eBay or amazon clearance.
customer_reviews.author: S Howell

customer_reviews.title: If you have a wide foot this is not for you.
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought for my son but turns out that he has a wider foot and I decided to keep them for myself to practice along side with him. Shoes are light weight, comfortable and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 15 year high school baseball player. He says they fit perfectly and are very comfortable. Usually wears Nike but preferred the feel of these Adidas.
customer_reviews.author: BigSchlink

customer_reviews.title: White Shoe paint peels away quickly
customer_reviews.text: I liked how nice they looked at first. After one baseball practice the white started to peel away on the top off the toe part of the outside of the shoe. They are quite comfortable but don’t expect them to stay white long.
customer_reviews.author: Cartersmomcarmen

customer_reviews.title: lite and quality out of the box
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are lite and seem to be durable. It is too soon to tell if they are quality shoes. I have to use them long enough to give and informed review, but they seem to be quality shoes out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. Says they fit perfect and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality cleat
customer_reviews.text: Previously worn Nike and New Balance cleats and they wore out before the season was over and these cleats are noticeably lighter and lasted the entire season just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Wil Harnetiaux

customer_reviews.title: The durability of the shoots terrible do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The Integrity of the shoe was terrible shoe has already ripped and the durability is terrible
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Mason

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great. Wears well.
customer_reviews.text: The size was accurate and a great fit. The shoes look really nice on and he says they’re comfortable. Good Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Swtmomma

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Quality at Amazon Price
customer_reviews.text: Adidas is a great product and can always rely on their quality.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Really "bites" into s**t
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color scheme. I used this product to climb dung mountains.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Arrived on time and fits like a glove
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: One shoe rubbed my son's heel raw. He bled through his socks. He tried them again a week later after putting padding in, but no luck. Wish we saved the box! I would send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Adair

customer_reviews.title: Finally a durable comfortable cleat
customer_reviews.text: Used for a whole season and they are better than other cleats I've had in the past. Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.author: Dank

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My son said it made him run faster!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Ceral

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well for baseball! Fit him perfectly! He was happy!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: They work for softball too!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter to play softball. They fit well and she loves them! (Added bonus....her team colors are blue and white)
customer_reviews.author: Ghost's Owner

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean fits great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses these cleats and they actually stay white, unlike the rest of the white cleats on the market. They are easy to clean too.Comfortable and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Why so narrow
customer_reviews.text: I've never worn or had the need to wear wide shoes but these things are very narrow. Not sure that the next size up would be the solution.
customer_reviews.author: Popper

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleats
customer_reviews.text: My son (15yrs old) loves these cleats, super light weight, but they have great support and flexibility! Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L

customer_reviews.title: Tournament Player
customer_reviews.text: They are really good for a $40 cleat. Very light and comfortable. They are not very breathable, though.
customer_reviews.author: Morris Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Shoe is very tight and hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: Almost impossible to slip on and incredibly tight around your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bling & Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: My son was wanting a cleat with a little “bling”. These are great!!!!! Very comfortable also!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Neikirk

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats!
customer_reviews.text: Love the cleats! Didn't kill my feet breaking then in and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Beam

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cleats
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and very comfortable for my high school player
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: excellent! so good as expected and the price is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Cleats!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like them a lot, comfortable and light as all get out...great pair of cleats, would order them over and over again
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Light weight cleats.
customer_reviews.text: Great spikes. Extremely light. High school aged son loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Vermeer

customer_reviews.title: Buy a half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: I love the cleats but run about a half size smaller than I normally wear and had to buy another pair
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great look and fit!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for baseball. Liked the color and the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Sovey

customer_reviews.title: Few dislikes but great cleats
customer_reviews.text: They tear very easily but otherwise love the comfort and stability on the field
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very light weight but a little tight when brand new.
customer_reviews.author: rhillbilly40

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! He said they feel like socks on his feet.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea N Ort

customer_reviews.title: They will support your feet and look great as well.
customer_reviews.text: I love how light the cleats are and how they support my feet when playing.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: I would like to change the product because it is very small
customer_reviews.text: I would like to change the product because it is very small
customer_reviews.author: Froymer

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Addidas cleats! He is the number one rated high school kid in the state in his senior class so I would say they are high performing.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ray

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Adizero Afterburner V Baseball Shoe
product_meta.description: Burn the base paths in the lightest shoes in the game. These men's baseball studs feature a double thickness midsole for added comfort and less stud pressure. The Sprintskin upper and boot construction provide a lightweight, sock-like fit, while the Sprintframe plate provides excellent traction.
feature_bullets: Sprintskin upper is a revolutionary laminated package for incredible support and reduced weight
Bootee construction for a sock-like fit and ankle support
Ironskin toe cap provides superior abrasion resistance in key toe-drag area
Litestrike EVA midsole is lighter than conventional midsoles
Sprintframe plate with external heel features a rotational traction zone delivering unrivaled traction
